NAME: 游
CLINIC_INFO:
保護措施:(就地接觸)Clostridium difficile困難梭菌;
1.肺炎，未明示病原體 2.敗血症，未明示病原體 3.中性桿狀核粒細胞增加
DESC_IMP:
攝影項目:
1003 Chest Anteroposterior View – Portable

No cardiomegaly. 
Tortuous thoracic aorta with intimal calcification. 
Right pneumothorax post right chest pigtail catheter placement. 
Consolidations, cavitory lesions and infiltrations in right lung. 
Intact bony thorax. 
Post left subclavian chemocatheter, nasogastric tube placement.
